wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.title: WFRP4e - Zero Wounds
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.description: Handles Prone, Unconscious, Wake Up, and Death effects for PCs and NPCs when Wounds drop to 0. Supports automatic modes, chat prompts, and GM-controlled outcomes.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.enable: Enable or disable all features of this module.
Apply these rules to all player characters.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.pcPron: How to handle Prone when a PC is reduced to 0 Wounds.
Send chat notification when Prone is applied automatically.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.pcUnco: How to handle Unconscious after staying at 0 Wounds for TB rounds.
Send chat notification when Unconscious is applied automatically.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.pcWake: How to handle removal of Unconscious when a PC has more than 0 Wounds.
Send chat notification when Unconscious is removed automatically.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.pcDeat: How to handle death when the death threshold is reached. GM only.
Send a notification to the GM when Death is applied automatically.
Allows the GM to spend 1 Fate Point to prevent death: removes all Bleeding conditions and pauses death, leaving the character unconscious but stable.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.enable: Apply these rules to NPCs and creatures.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.npcPro: How to handle Prone when an NPC reaches 0 Wounds.
Send chat notification when Prone is applied automatically.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.npcUnc: How to handle Unconscious after TB rounds at 0 Wounds.
Send chat notification when Unconscious is applied automatically.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.npcWak: How to handle removal of Unconscious when an NPC has more than 0 Wounds.
Send chat notification when Unconscious is removed automatically.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.npcDea: How to handle death for NPCs when the death threshold is reached. GM only.
Send a notification to the GM when Death is applied automatically to NPCs.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.pcReci: Who receives messages for PCs reaching 0 Wounds.
Who receives messages when PCs wake from Unconscious.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.npcRec: Who receives messages for NPCs and creatures.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.message: {actorName} has been reduced to 0 Wounds. Falls
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.unconsciou: {actorName} has remained at 0 Wounds for too long (TB {tb}) and now falls
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.wake: {actorName} is no longer at 0 Wounds and may remove
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.death: {actorName} has reached the death threshold (TB {tb}) and may die
